author: Reuters Editorial
title: Segue Group to offer off-floor distribution of shares
text:
Feb 13 (Reuters) - Segue Group Co Ltd
* Says it will offer an off-floor distribution of 200,000 shares on Tokyo Stock Exchange between Feb. 21 and Feb. 23
* Offering price will be determined based on the closing share price of the day before the distribution
* Says the limitation for distribution is up to 1,000 shares for each customer
Source text in Japanese: goo.gl/YEhLCT
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
